extension.summary: Watch and listen to DRs programming whenever you want
Se og hør DRs programmer når du vil
extension.description: DR (Danish Broadcasting Corporation) provides a variation of their programming as podcasts, where typically 5-10 of the latest episodes are available online.
DR udgiver en række af deres programmer som video podcasts, hvor typisk de seneste 5-10 afsnit er tilgængelige online.
